Title: Chapter Six: The Spy
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Kate Trefry, Jessie Nickson-Lopez (executive story editor), Paul Dichter (staff writer), Kate Trefry (staff writer)
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: Will's connection to a shadowy evil grows stronger but no one's quite sure how to stop it. Elsewhere, Dustin and Steve forge an unlikely bond.
